free: #e The students in Taiwan University are very hardworking.

#e The students in Taiwan University are all very hardworking.
#c 台灣大學的學生都很努力
#e My book is on the table.
#n nanku valray 我的書本/紙張/課本/文件；puwa放  i puwa被放在
#e My neighbor’s cat is on his lap.
#c 他的腿上有我鄰居的貓
#n pa’a大腿; tu他的；ngiaw喵 naku ’udar我的鄰居
#e My neighbor’s cat is on his (neighbor’s) lap.
#c 我的鄰居的貓在他(鄰居)的腿上
#e The teacher’s daughter holds her boyfriend’s dog.
#c 老師的女兒牽著她的男朋友的狗
#n kinasahar喜歡的異性; i sinsi 老師(限定); na sinsi 老師(非限定); keruan牽; sahar 喜歡/愛;  kinasaharan 最喜歡的;  kasahar會喜歡; tukerengaw tu suan 拉著 綁著; kezeng 人牽動物; kuru 人牽人; makakuru牽手; marakuru互相手牽手; *na的標記不確定
#n *sahar ku *我喜歡；sahar ku kana nazu 我喜歡他們
#n vulraw 魚, 動詞+ za(斜格) +名詞
#e They (female) hold each other’s hands when dancing.
#c 當跳舞的時候，他們牽著手
#n anay朋友 saariyan男生朋友, tu kuruwaw 牽著我的手(因為V+aw, 前面要有一個代名詞tu), marekakuru 互相牽著手(mare-Ca-RED), nu muwarak 在跳傳統舞的時候, lralrakan長者稱呼孩子們

gloss: 他.屬格=牽-受事焦點=我.主格
free: #n tu kuruwaw 把我的手這樣牽著；動詞有加aw的話，前面要有代名詞(tu)
#n i muri祖父母(單數), na muri祖父母(複數), mulri祖父, kemezeng 拉,
#n 同語意：na sinsi mu sahar kana temakakesi
#e The cook use knife to cut meat.
#e The cook is holding a knife to cut meat.
#c 廚師拿著刀子正在切肉。
#e Saki asked Miing to send a letter.
#e The tree fell and destroyed my home.
#c 樹倒了然後破壞了我家。
#e My cat bit me and I got a wound.
#c 我的貓咬了我，然後就有傷口了。
#e Uyang laughed because he was happy.
#c Uyang  因為高興所以笑了。
#n i Uyang 也可以放最前面
#e Uyang was angry, so he hit me.
#e Uyang usually goes home to cook for his mother, but Uyang does not go home to cook for his mother on holidays, because Uyang cooks for sick elderly people on holidays.
#c Uyang平常都會回家做菜給媽媽吃，但Uyang假日不回家做菜給媽媽吃，因為Uyang假日要做菜給生病的老人吃。
#e The meat (that) Imay eats is spoiled.
#n ’angliw=lra 臭酸了; angtrul 臭(臭味); angru 肉腐爛味
#e This person is willing to help people.
#e (As for) this person, he is very willing to help people.
#c 這個人，他很願意幫助人。
#n kasa 非常/很; salaw 很; wawayi 會願意
#e Will you be willing (to do something)?
#e He does not want to eat something cold.
#n i Sanpuy 也可以擺前面
#e Miing used a knife to cut the watermelon into two pieces for Sanpuy and Uyang, who had just returned from hunting.
#c Miing用刀子把西瓜切成兩塊給剛打獵回來的Sanpuy和Uyang吃。
#n maw ziya剛回來; melak 拿; tralun 獵場、野地; taramunah 西瓜
#e Sanpuy and Uyang ate the watermelon that Miing cut into two pieces with a knife.
#c Sanpuy和Uyang吃了Miing 用刀子切成兩塊的西瓜。
#e Sanpuy and Uyang ate the watermelon that Miing cut into two pieces with this knife.
#c Sanpuy和Uyang吃了Miing 用這把刀子切成兩塊的西瓜。
#e The student who was beaten by the teacher is not studying.
#c 那個被老師打的學生沒有在讀書。
#e The student who was not beaten by the teacher is not studying.
#c 那個不是被老師打的學生現在在讀書。
#e I guarantee that Uyang is willing to help others.
#c 我保證 Uyang 很願意幫助人。
#e I guarantee that such a person like Uyang is will to help people.
#c 我保證 Uyang 這個人很願意幫助人。
#e I guarantee that such a person like Uyang is will to help people.
#c 我保證 Uyang 這個人很願意幫助人。
#e Sanpuy is happy to cook for Uyang who is happy
#c Sanpuy 很開心地幫開心的Uyang 煮飯。
#e Sanpuy is happy to cook for Uyang who is happy.
#c Sanpuy 很開心地幫開心的Uyang 煮飯。

gloss: 他.屬格=夾-受惠焦點=我.主格
free: #e The aunt who was sitting opposite pick up for me a bowl of dishes that I didn't like with bamboo chopsticks.
#c 坐在對面的阿姨用竹筷子幫我夾了一碗我不喜歡的菜。
#n na patrepa’ 對面; kemayan 坐; ’aratrip 筷子; za sakisiyan za melri ku kinasahar na siyaw 不是我最喜歡的菜
#e The chopsticks that the aunt used to pick up dishes broke.
#c 阿姨用來夾菜的筷子斷掉了。
#n muritru’=lra 也可以用在橋斷了
#e The aunt used bamboo chopsticks to help Uyang whose hand is injured to pick up a bowl of vegetables.
#c  阿姨用竹筷子幫手受傷的Uyang夾了一碗菜。
#n i ina tu ’aratripanay za siyaw i Uyang kana panana tu lima 也可?
#e The clothes that are washed are left at the door.
#c 洗好了的衣服被放在門口。
#e Uyang says that he is willing to help others.
#n marengay i Uyang (i) intaw mu salaw muwanyi pulralrang za trau也可
#e I teach in Zhiben elementary school.
#n ki是取得、採收；kia kiya kya三種書寫方式仍有討論
#n mu可以代表複數，也可以代表徵得同意的疑問詞「嗎」、「為甚麼」
#c 我在屋子外面（家的庭院）。
#n kazu ku i patraran 我不在家（可能在街上）。
#e My father is in the mountain.
#n 等同於wuza i zenan i malri
#e Teacher Uksang’s father is in the mountain.
#e Teacher Uksang’s mother is in the mountain.
#n nani 我的母親/阿姨	inna 阿姨/姑姑	　sayheng 菜園（閩南語）
#e We will meet at the foot of the mountain at six o’clock in the evening.
#c 我們傍晚6點會在山腳下見面
#e We will meet at the foot of the mountain at six o’clock in the evening.
#c 我們傍晚6點會在山腳下見面
#e Risem will hunt for flying squirrel at midnight.
#c Risem深夜要在樹林裡打飛鼠。
#n 此句等同於auwa i kawikawi ki nawang a i Risem nu asavak 'esunganan，或是auwa i Risem i kawikawi ki nawang a nu asavak 'esunganan；kikawi 採木材
#n para-V 喜歡V; alrupe’ 已經睡覺 (字根)

gloss: 我們.主格=<主事焦點>沾酒點撒
free: #e We pentrik first before we eat.

gloss: 狀態-主焦-<重疊>睡覺=我.主格

free: #e Give him lean meat to eat.
#n  isi 肉(沒有油的)可以是豬肉
#n ay ku (給我); maluwa (夠了); ‘alum (肉); isi (瘦肉)
#n varivariw (瘦); ketreve (粗大的，可形容樹或人); senay (歌)
#n kenaw (蔥); ka-sever-an 春天(一定會長芽的那個季節); sever (植物的芽); semasever(正在長新芽)
#e Sanpuy gives Imay money, (and) Imay gives Sanpuy fish.
#c Sanpuy 給 Imay 錢，Imay 給 Sanpuy 魚。
#n veray (給); 第一個tu是Sanpuy,第二個tu是Ima,tu是做那件事情的人
#e He gives her money, (and) she gives him fish.
#n zi (和、然後、又、而); 後面那句才有mu 表示兩個事件的動作有關係

gloss: 他.屬格=給-處所焦點=完成
free: #e He has given (it) to her, and she has given (it) to him.
#n 媽媽跟阿姨都在的時候，直接叫某個阿姨
#e Saki and Miing don’t like to eat bamboo shoots.
#n za可以和zi互換(語意指’和’的時候)
#e Saki, Miing, and Uking don’t like bamboo shoots.
#n  papiya可置於tatelu後面 (i Saki za i Miing zi i Uking nazu tatelu papiya ‘azi sahar za selu’); tatelu (三人); za i = zi i (za i 比較常說); nazu tatelu papiya (他們三個都)
#n nu t<em>a<ka>kesi (正在學習); takesi (讀冊)
#n za zuwa 兩個人; zuwa-ya (兩個東西)
#e I like those two wine glasses.
#c 我喜歡那(它們)兩個酒杯
#n kanazu (它們，但可以指人或東西/前面一定會有一個動詞); nazu (他們); na (連接詞); kanizu (一個); kanani (這些)
#c Miing 幫 Sanpuy 煮魚(成菜餚)。

#n * kani Sanpuy tu tusasiyaw-anay i Miing za vulraw (kani 一定要放後面); Miing是主事者，i Miing 移到動詞後面時，為了和 i Sanpuy 區分開， i Sanpuy要改成 kani Sanpuy; tu 和 Miing coindex; Puyuma的OBL和其他語言不一樣的、OBL可能是core; i Sanpuy的i看不出case, 換成kani就很明顯是OBL; siyanaw (煎)
#n = i Miing tu deruwanay (tu sasiyawanay) kani Sanpuy za vulraw
#n = tu deruwanay (tu sasiyawanay) i Miing kani Sanpuy za vulraw

gloss: 他.屬格=做成-<重疊>菜-受焦

free: #e Miing cook the fish for Sanpuy to eat.
#c Miing 把魚做成菜餚給Sanpuy吃
#e Do not forget to take away your books and pens after class.
#c 下課之後，不要忘記帶走書和筆。

#e There is no fish in the river.
#n zanum (水); paisu-isu-wa (沒有錢); uniyan (沒有); kana (在)

gloss: 處格-<主事焦點>前面=我.主格
free: #n 此句也可寫作mupatraran; patraran外面; mupatraran 往外面; ngamuwayan (我的)前面; ngawayan 前面; ingamuayan 有"要"的意思
#n itras 上面; i itras 在上面
#n 同輩間說的道別用語; uwa 去
#n 向長輩說的道別語; pamaw 正確

gloss: 他.屬格=煮-受惠焦點=我.主格
free: #e Saki cooks for me every day.
#n ziya 每; kana wariwari ziya 每天; kana ’ami 每年; kana ’ilras ziya 每月; kana ’ami ziya 每年; deru 煮飯(命令式); -anay 受惠焦點(beneficiary)
#e Saki cooks for my friend every day.
#n -lri 我的; i ali’lri 我的朋友; i malri 我的爸爸; i wadilri 我的弟妹; i valri 我的哥哥姊姊; i nani 我的媽媽; 稱呼自己媽媽叫ina
#e After Sanpuy’s aunt did the laundry yesterday afternoon, she swept the yard.
#c Sanpuy的阿姨昨天下午洗完衣服後，打掃了庭院。
#n i naina阿姨; kadaw 太陽; alusu a kadaw 下午; patraran 房子外面(沒有庭院這個字); idap 家裡的掃把; 'uris 竹掃把; remames 洗衣物; tatraran 路上; a 過去; piya 完畢; adaman 昨天; 阿姨會區分年齡比媽媽大或小
#e After Sanpuy’s aunt (his father’s elder sister) did the laundry yesterday afternoon, she swept the yard with bamboo broom.
#c Sanpuy的姑姑(比爸爸大)昨天下午洗完衣服後，用竹掃把打掃了庭院。
#n temamataw 他的爸爸; marama’izang 年齡較大; maratawan (年齡組織裡面的學長姐 e.g.中年級的四年級)
#e My books are all on the table.
#n 此句的ulra可以替換成kazu; peniya 全部(東西); papiya 全部(人)
#e The teacher likes all the students.
#e I don’t want the computer that Saki used.
#n p<in>i- 用過的; ni 某人的; tu 可寫作a tu (他); pini-tīnnaw可寫作pini-tinnaw; amanan 不要
#e I want the computer that Saki used.
#n ay 給我; ai 是的; ay ku 我要
#e Uyang will drink a glass of glutinous rice wine before ritual.
#c Uyang 在祭儀開始前會先喝一杯糯米酒(很甜)
#n pungaway 之前; palisi 祭儀; ka-palisi-yan 祭儀的時段; takilr 酒杯; tinavuavu' 釀好的甜酒; kutra 酒; tremekel 喝酒(喝水不能用)
#e Not him. He loves to drink alcohol.
#e All the teachers will dance tonight.
#c 所有老師們今天晚上會跳舞。
#n la-likasaw 將要跳舞; likasaw 我命令你跳舞; ma-likasaw 在跳舞(陳述); ma-likakasaw 正在跳舞(持續動作); ziya 所有的; nu karauv 晚上(還沒到)
#c 多個老師們(非全部)昨天晚上在跳舞。
#n kazuwan 很多人; kayta 走吧; kaytayan 很少人; mukuwa 去; nu-時間 (還沒到的); a-時間 (已經過的)
#n mapiya 大家; ’inavayan 好處(你好); inava 好(確定的); nava=lra 幸好
#n harem (現在); =lra PFV對應中文”了2”，final particle, change of state
#e When villagers are sick, they go to see the doctor.
#c 村民們感冒的時候，會去找醫生看病。
#n kuwaleng 生病; ising 醫生/診所; kiputremel 接受治療、服藥; patreme 藥; ki…接受(治療); mukuwa ……a 去做某事; zekalr 村莊; z<in>ekalr-anan 村民、族人; -anan 成員
#e  Saki did not know that Miing and Uyang had gone home.
#c  Saki 不知道 Miing 和 Uyang 都回家了。
#n mu-ruma’ 去-家 (往家裡去); mazalarm 知道; mu 往/變成... (冰棒融化也可以用); mu-’ami 往北邊去; mukuwa- 去.AF (e.g. mukuwa i Taipei 去台北); mu-zekalr 去村莊
#e I heard Sanpuy sang the song he (Sanpuy) liked to Saki.
#c 我聽到 Sanpuy 給 Saki 唱了他(Sanpuy)喜歡的歌。
#n kinger 聽; 這句masenay唱歌可能是在過去唱; *na的標記不確定
#e I heard Sanpuy singing the song Saki liked.
#c 我聽到 Sanpuy 正在唱Saki所喜歡的歌。
#n masasenay = semasenay 都是當下正在唱歌, masasenay比較少講; temakakesi 學生(正在念書); *na的標記不確定
#e The students in the whole school will go from Zhiben to Taipei by train.
#c 整間學校的學生都要從知本部落坐火車去台北。
#n  kungkuwan(=takesian) 學校; wu-itras (命令你)搭車; kemay 從; mu-itras 上去了; tusiya 汽車; muitras 搭乘; Taihok=Taipak=Taipei; itras 要搭，muitras 是「上去、上樓、搭上」，waitras 是「要搭」，witras 是命令式的「搭」類似建議。
#e I come to Taipei by train.
#e If the chair is broken, have Uyang fix it.
#c 如果椅子壞掉了，就給Uyang 修理。
#n lipad 椅子; muranak 壞; inavaya 還很好
#e Uyang is very good at fixing chairs.
#e Miing is very good at cooking.
#e They see that Saki is going to school.
#c 他們看到 Saki 正準備去學校。
#e They see that Saki is going to school.
#c 他們看到 Saki 正準備去學校。
#n *uri tusasiyaw *uri temusasiyaw; kulang 蔬菜; tamana 高麗菜; tawsay 豆芽菜; saytaw 白蘿蔔(菜頭); ningin 人參
#e Do not let Miing eat the fish she likes to eat.
#c 不要給Miing吃她喜歡(吃)的魚。
#e The person talking to the principal is my mother.
#c 正在跟校長聊天的人是我媽媽。
#n maw 是 ，kimazazayar 商量/聊天/談話; mazayazayar 討論; ma-rengay AF.講話;  ma-<ra>rengay 正在講話
#e Those people talking about the principal are bad people.
#c 那些在談論校長的人是不好的人。
#n kuwatreng 不好; 這句的trau 是head, 那些…的trau 是 na …人
#n mupisin (破掉，只能指衣物); sikatu (裙子，不分男女); katrakatr (長褲); munpi (女用長褲， 日語) *mupisin=lra za sikatu (一定要有一個人，需要主格所以用 na (mupisin=lra na sikatu)，而非斜格za)
#e We divide the papaya into two pieces.
#n ta=可以代換成 ku=/tu=/nu=，*parekazuwayaw na katawa ta
#n p<en>usar (逃跑，沒有pemusar?); p/v 開頭的AF用<en>; penapusar 很少用
#e He stole the money from here.
#e He stole the gold from Grandma. (uncertain possession)
#c 他從祖母那裏偷了金子。
#e He stole the gold which I put in Grandparent’s place.
#c 他偷了我放在祖父母那邊的金子。
#e Saki sends a letter to Miing.
#n 寫信給人家寄 tigami 日文借字 ated寄; 這句意同 paated za tigami i Saki kani Miing = paated za tigami kani Miing  i Saki
#n 這句意同 i Saki paated za tigami
#e The teacher likes the student wearing red clothes.
#c 老師喜歡那個穿紅色衣服的學生。
#n nikavang 穿衣服; zangzarang (紅色的); ’uze’uzem (黑色): vulretri’ (白色); malu’ (黃)zem’at (綠色)
#e When grass and flowers wither, the winter has come.
#c 花草枯萎的時候，代表冬天來了。
#n  na ’aputr 的 na 不可省略
#e The ice cream that Saki bought melted and fell on the floor.
#c Saki買的冰淇淋融化後掉在地板上了。
#n ice cream; tima’ (買); mu-terenaw也有這種說法 (融化掉了) (錢也可以用，借給別人之後，變零零星星的)
#e Saki kicks the ball into the classroom.
#n savak可以替換成patraran (外面); i Saki 可以移到最後; 不會用musavak因為是有人操縱所以用pusavak。
#e My wallet was stolen last Monday, but the police found it last Wednesday.
#c 我的錢包上個星期一被偷了，但上個星期三被警察找回來了。
#n maw mu 但是; puhimpiyayan=puhinpiyayan=kupaisuwan (kupaisuwan 是放紙鈔的錢包); liyus 轉; liyusan 周; puruma’ 找回來; maw mu 但是; tu 是警察
#e A tree ruined my house when it fell.
#c 一棵樹倒的時候，毀了我的房子。
#n 颱風的話不能用 kilarnak; zi 然後/而/所以
#e My house is ruined by the typhoon.
#c 我的房子因為颱風壞了。
#c 這個孩子弄壞了我的腳踏車。
#n tu 是小孩，此句意同 tu ranakaw naku dinsiya ini na alrak
#e Saki received the letter Miing sent from Taipei.
#n tuluz 遞; ni Miing 拿掉的話，kanatu要改成kana (Saki收到從台北寄來的信)
#e Saki received a letter sent from Taipei.
#e Uyang plans to go home and use ice to ice patch his wound bitten by the cat.
#c Uyang打算回家用冰塊冰敷被貓咬傷的傷口。
#n kuli 冰塊; tu kuli’ay 冰敷; kinaratan 咬傷; vuli’ 傷口; karat 咬
#e When Lapi got Uyang’s phone call again, he was happy, so he laughed.
#c Lapi再一次接到Uyang的電話時，因為很開心所以笑了。
#n masa 再次; semangal開心/高興; masasalr 一再的
#e The meat Miing left this morning has rotten.
#c  Miing早上沒吃完的肉已經壞掉了。
#n kuwatreng 壞掉/不能吃，muranak 東西(物體)壞掉，也可以說 i Miing tu sama’ mekan na ’alum a semavalr mu kuwatreng lra 也可為 kuwatreng lra tu sama’ mekan na ’alum a semavalr ni Miing; semavalr早晨
